name: Beard Your Own Adventure
description:
Beard Your Own Adventure -- 

Find Adventure Right Under Your Nose!
 
(c) 2021 todorrobot games

Built in two-weeks for Winter Flowjam 2021. 

Click or Tap to select tools to choose between 28 different illustrations, and fuzz your face to your heart's content. Find the WIZARD to open FREE PLAY (or is there another way?). 

All Game Design, Music and Illustrations created between Jan 17 - Jan 29. Story and Concept from an incomplete mini-comic idea I retrieved from an old 2006 sketchbook in my basement.
